title: How to Craft a Jukebox on Minecraft

steps.title: Get the required materials for the jukebox.
steps.content: Get the required materials for the jukebox. You will need eight wooden planks and a diamond.

steps.title: Obtain wooden planks.
steps.content: Obtain wooden planks. Convert your logs into wooden planks. Any variety of wooden plank will work to craft a jukebox.

steps.title: Obtain diamonds.
steps.content: Obtain diamonds. Diamonds can be found in naturally generated structures such as villages and mansions. They can also be found in groups of 1-8 below y-level 15. Diamonds can be tedious to get, so don't get too frustrated if you are unable to find any.

steps.title: Craft a crafting table or head to the nearest one.
steps.content: Craft a crafting table or head to the nearest one.

steps.title: Place eight wooden planks all around and one diamond in the center.
steps.content: Place eight wooden planks all around and one diamond in the center. The jukebox should appear and take it and place it in your inventory.

steps.title: Place the jukebox where you wish.
steps.content: Place the jukebox where you wish.

steps.title: Obtain a music disc.
steps.content: Obtain a music disc. Music discs can be found in dungeon chests, when a skeleton kills a creeper, or in Bastion Remnants.

steps.title: Hold the music disc and play it on the jukebox.
steps.content: Hold the music disc and play it on the jukebox. There are multiple disks and multiple "songs" that you can obtain and play.
